definitions.definition: The quality of being confident, not afraid or easily intimidated, but without being incautious or inconsiderate.
definitions.example: It takes a lot of courage to be successful in business.

definitions.definition: The ability to overcome one's fear, do or live things which one finds frightening.
definitions.example: He plucked up the courage to tell her how he felt.

definitions.definition: The ability to maintain one's will or intent despite either the experience of fear, frailty, or frustration; or the occurrence of adversity, difficulty, defeat or reversal.
